trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Novato
There was one other sighting in Novato on or around August 6th 2013
Summary: Bright orange circular object flying straight above me. Disappeared into sky then reappared. Was going in a straight line.
divs: Sighting Details1. Was in the hot tub. 2.My son pointed at it and I notcied the lights. 3. I didnt know what it was, never seen anything like it. So I assumed i was witnessing a UFO. 4. It flew in a steady line at a steady speed. Was a circular shape and was Orange with tints of red lights. As it was moving it ascended higher into the air and disappeared into the sky. Then came back. did this twice and I lost sight of it after that. 5. I was in Awe. I couldnt belive what i just seen. I wanted to see it again and i kept searching for it in the sky. Was excited and Amazed. 6. It disappeared into the sky as it went over an Apartment bulding.
